title: vaibhavsingh
author: vaibhavsingh
created_time: February 01, 2023, 02:47:20 AMLast edit: February 08, 2023, 01:21:50 PM by vaibhavsingh
content: Website: https://coinhub.wiki/     ★ General Features:News - Stay up-to-date on latest crypto and tech news.Wiki - Explore blockchain and crypto related topics in depth (being expanded).Tools - Useful tools that allow users to compare between hundreds of cryptocurrencies and explore several blockchains.     ★ Member Features:Members Area - Users new to the crypto universe can claim some free crypto every few mins.Offerwalls - Several popular offerwalls for users looking to complete simple tasks and get paid in crypto.URL Shortener - Shorten your URLs before sharing on social media etc, paying upto $16/1k views for both unique and returning visitors.Referral System - Refer other users to CoinHub and get 5% of their earnings for life (from everything including offerwalls and the url shortener).Instant Withdrawals - Withdrawals are processed instantly via Faucetpay with a low minimum withdrawal limit of only $2.Sections such as the wiki and tools are being improved and more offerwalls are being added. All suggestions are welcome.
